title: Ep 13: Erica Leigh Mills
itunes:title: Ep 13: Erica Leigh Mills
itunes:subtitle: Erica Leigh Mills joins Gee Thanks today for a special themed episode...drum roll...UNDER $10 LIFECHANGERS!
description:
Erica Leigh Mills joins Gee Thanks today for a special themed episode...drum roll...UNDER $10 LIFECHANGERS! We each brought our favorite cheapo product to the stage and by doing so we covered: bathtime, cleaning the tub, washing walls (do you? do you not?), weddings, jewelry, etc. etc. etc. 


Love the podcast? You’ll love the Instagram community forming around it! https://Instagram.com/geethanksjustboughtitpod 


Erica is at Disney World as this episode is airing because she’s running the half marathon there, a thing that I think I would love to do one day but definitely will not. Oh right, we also talk about running. You’re gonna love it!


Mentioned on the podcast:

  • Gorilla Grip Overflow Drain Stopper: https://amzn.to/2wBXpXf
  • Diamond Dazzle Stick: https://amzn.to/2V4AhuB
  • Jewelry Cleaner Machine If You’re Zsa Zsa Gabor: https://amzn.to/2vVhxmv
  • HEY LADIES! By Michelle Markowitz and Caroline Moss: https://amzn.to/3bUpo4t
  • Why Do Men Only Have One Towel? You guys, I searched high and low for this link. I know I didn’t make it up! Please, if you find it, send it!
  • Weight Watchers Helped Me Beat My Food Addiction and Lose 146 Pounds by Erica Leigh Mills: https://www.womenshealthmag.com/weight-loss/a28968953/weight-watchers-food-addiction/


Follow Erica on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/sweet_pea_leigh/


Thanks for listening!

Check out blog posts and all of the recommended products by past guests, listeners and Caroline at www.geethanksjustboughtit.com 

Shop the spreadsheet (updated with new recs all of the time!): https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1vdIkPMWhV0FlRux3u_DVpuGvakQxkF3EbYT2ZVv45B8/edit#gid=0 and the Amazon store: https://www.amazon.com/shop/geethanksjustboughtit

Follow along with recs (and share your own via DM) on the “Gee Thanks, Just Bought It!” Instagram: www.instagram.com/geethanksjustboughtitpod

Want to get in touch more formally? Have a rec you want to rec? Shoot me an email! Caroline@geethanksjustboughtit.com


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
